Empowering all people to be plant people — a collection of articles from The Sill’s team of Plant Experts across a variety of plant care topics to inspire confidence in the next generation of plant parents. Welcome to Plant Parenthood™.

Luckily, we have a few ideas on watering for optimum plant health.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][gsf_space desktop=”40″ tablet=”40″ tablet_portrait=”40″ mobile_landscape=”30″ mobile=”30″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”966″ img_size=”181×118″ alignment=”right” el_class=”sm-text-center” css_animation=”left-to-right”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”custom-css-home-01″ width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1545376332259{margin-top: 25px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;border-left-color: #cccccc !important;border-left-style: solid !important;}”][gsf_heading text_align=”text-left” title_font_size=”22||||” sub_title_font_size=”16″ sub_title_letter_spacing=”px” css_animation=”right-to-left” el_class=”sm-text-center” title=”Alycia Jasmin” sub_title=”Founder/CEO”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][gsf_space desktop=”75″ tablet=”50″ tablet_portrait=”50″ mobile_landscape=”40″ mobile=”40″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes”][vc_column][gsf_space desktop=”120″ tablet=”70″ tablet_portrait=”60″ mobile_landscape=”50″ mobile=”40″][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”bottom-to-top” offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″][gsf_banner hover_effect=”jazz-effect” background_postion=”background-center” image=”1353″][gsf_space desktop=”0″ tablet=”0″ tablet_portrait=”30″ mobile_landscape=”30″ mobile=”15″][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3″][gsf_banner hover_effect=”jazz-effect” image=”992″][/vc_column][vc_column el_class=”pl-xl-5″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-5″][gsf_space desktop=”56″ tablet=”40″ tablet_portrait=”40″ mobile_landscape=”40″ mobile=”40″][gsf_heading text_align=”text-left” title_line_height=”em” sub_title_font_size=”17″ sub_title_letter_spacing=”px” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” title=”Fall/Summer Terrariums” sub_title=”NEW COLLECTION”][gsf_space desktop=”35″ tablet=”25″ tablet_portrait=”25″ mobile_landscape=”20″ mobile=”20″][vc_column_text css_animation=”bottom-to-top”]

“Simple is the best”, they say. Indeed, it is. At Amely, we put a strong emphasis on simplicity, quality and usefulness of fashion products over other factors.
